name: Hunt N' Peck (Cmdr3nder, dreamsprite)
description:
A bite sized experience about revealing the details of an empty city.

Created for Trijam #153: The 3 hour game jam (Empty World)

Created by:
Andrew Bowers (Cmdr3nder) - 2h 29m
Anna Bowers (Dreamsprite) - 1h 36m

Tools:
Aseprite image editing
Godot game engine
